title: Multiple Price Proposal Response
description: Latest price and other details for a given contract

spot.description: Spot value (if there are no exchange data-feed licensing restrictions for the underlying symbol). Example: 9874.52

proposal_array.description: Latest price and other details for a given contract
proposal_array.title: Price Proposal for Multiple Contracts Response

id.description: A stream id that can be used to cancel this stream using the Forget request. Example: 1d6651e7d599bce6c54bd71a8283e579

date_start.description: Starting date for available contracts (epoch time). Example: 1439999053

proposals.description: Latest price and other details for available contracts
proposals.title: Multiple Price Proposal Response

barrier.description: Barrier for the contract (or last digit prediction for digit contracts). Contracts less than 24 hours in duration would need a relative barrier (barriers which need +/-), where entry spot would be adjusted accordingly with that amount to define a barrier, except for Volatility Indices as they support both relative and absolute barriers.

barrier2.description: Low barrier for the contract (for contracts with two barriers). Contracts less than 24 hours in duration would need a relative barrier (barriers which need +/-), where entry spot would be adjusted accordingly with that amount to define a barrier, except for Volatility Indices as they support both relative and absolute barriers.

longcode.description: Example: Win payout if Random 100 Index is strictly higher than entry spot at 15 minutes after contract start time.

spot_time.description: Timestamp for latest spot (epoch time). Example: 1439999052

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
